About me

My name is Krzysztof Gurniak, also known as Celebes or Kris.
I am a programmer and an aspiring video game developer, based in Warsaw, Poland.

I currently am focused on my latest project named BingeGamez, be sure to check it out!

I have a master's degree in computer science from the Military University Of Technology.
I am currently employed at Isolution as a Java Web Developer.
